ch.nolix.common.alphaEndPoint

Class AlphaEndPointListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ch.nolix.common.alphaEndPoint.AlphaEndPointListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Abortable, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HTTPAlphaEndPointListener

    public class AlphaEndPointListener
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Abortable
    An alpha end point listener listens to alpha end points on a certain port.

      • AlphaEndPointListener

        public AlphaEndPointListener(int port,
                             IAlphaEndPointTaker alphaEndPointTaker)
        Creates new alpha end point listener with the given port and alpha end point taker. The new alpha end point listener will start automatically.
        Parameters:
        port -
        alphaEndPointTaker -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if: -the given port is negative or bigger than 65535 -the given alpha end point taker is null
